item.title: Video Course Recording - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled individual to record a video course for us. You will be provided with the script, lesson content, and slides. Your main responsibility will be to deliver high-quality video and voice recordings that effectively convey the course material. The ideal candidate should have experience in video production, voice-over work, and instructional design. Attention to detail and the ability to follow guidelines and instructions are crucial. We are looking for someone who can work independently and meet deadlines. If you have a passion for education and a talent for creating engaging video content, we would love to hear from you!

Relevant Skills:
- Video production
- Voice-over
- Instructional design


Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Change gif (or MP4) file of animated logo to transparent background and convert to MP4 file - Upwork
item.description:
I have a static logo file and also an animated version (gif / mp4)--and I need it to have a transparent background.  If you have to build it from scratch that's fine--it's less than 10 seconds and quite simple--but I need it in a format that I can upload to Avada Wordpress, either as an mp4, or webM... or any other suggestions would be great.  If what I'm asking for needs to be approached differently, please let me know that too.  Just need a solution.  Thanks so much!


Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:39 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Animated GIF, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Animation
Skills: Animated GIF, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Animation
Country: United States

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
I am seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our remote team. As our YouTube Video Editor, you will be responsible for transforming raw footage into engaging and visually appealing videos that align with our brand and storytelling style. You will collaborate closely with the team to bring this channel to life and enhance viewer engagement. Please share relevant video examples.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00

item.title: Video Editor For Top 10/General Topics YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone who can edit Top 10 videos for our YouTube channel based on random facts and scientific discoveries

Looking for someone who can deliver multiple videos a week

You will be responsible for editing YouTube videos similar to these

https://youtu.be/bpTUwwFzNxI?si=wSIRVXmXrHFwQv4G
https://youtu.be/TW4jI2fiMIM?si=ubD2_KUOyI7d4E85
https://youtu.be/XsQet7yDkhU?si=HU_Dl62BYHbmKU-l

Videos will be anywhere from 20 to 30 minutes long

You will be fully provided with a voiceover and a script for each video

Responsibilities:

- Edit video footage to create engaging, fast paced, high-quality content

- Proficiency in selecting and synchronizing the most fitting footage (extremely important)

- Able to utilize lower thirds and background graphics given to give the channel a more branded look

- Meet deadlines of completing 2 videos a week - all content is delivered on time and to the highest standard

Requirements:

- Ability to work quickly and efficiently under tight deadlines

- Willing to accept constructive feedback and open to making revisions as needed

- Strong attention to detail


Budget: $150
Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Ebook Video Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create 3 video ads for our ebook. The videos should be engaging, visually appealing, and effectively communicate the key benefits of the ebook. The video editor will be responsible for selecting and editing relevant footage, adding captions or text overlays, incorporating music or voiceovers, and ensuring the final videos meet our brand guidelines. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software, a strong understanding of storytelling techniques, and the ability to work collaboratively with our marketing team. Skills required for this project include:

- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Creative thinking
- Attention to detail
- Communication skills

This is a medium-sized project that is expected to be completed within 1 to 3 days . We are seeking an intermediate-level video editor who can bring our vision to life.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Top Rated Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to hire an experienced video editor for a luxury/celebrity YouTube Channel. Videos similar to:

https://www.youtube.com/@emmastories6771

We will be producing about 2 videos a week (8 per month) that are about 10 minutes long. The goal is to grow this channel to profitability and create sensational, viral content.

If you have experience video editing in the celebrity or luxury YouTube niche, feel free to apply and let's talk more details!

This is a long term collaboration with good payment structure.

Looking forward to working with you,
Adrienne

Hourly Range: $22.00-$38.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 22:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Narrative Video, Dynamic Transition, Video Transition, Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production
Skills: Narrative Video, Dynamic Transition, Video Transition, Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production
